Title: Storm
Description: Must choose patrol as your action.  During the patrol there is a bonus to flight and a penalty to chasing.  During the resolve weather effects phase take 1 rigging damage.

Title: Levanter
Description: Must select transfer to a different area as your action, choosing an area east of your present location.  Durring the resolve weather effects phase take 1 rigging damage.

Title: Mistral
Description: Must select transfer to a different area as your action, choosing an area south of your present location. Durring the resolve weather effects phase take 1 rigging damage.

Title: Poor Weather
Description: Modifiers to chases and coastal raiding.

Title: Becalmed
Description: Cannot transfer to a different area as your action.
